articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Welcome to Tidybiology. The goal of this endeaovour is to provide a "zero entry" introduction to R and data science to biologists.

The R and Tidyverse online communities are very active, helpful, and welcoming. One of the best ways to learn new things is to follow the #rstats hashtag on Twitter.
